name: PrivateBin
short_description: Minimalist, open source online pastebin with zero-knowledge server design.
description: Minimalist, open source online pastebin with zero-knowledge server design. PrivateBin is a self-hosted application focused on utility, privacy, notes, wiki. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host PrivateBin on your home server to minimalist, open source online pastebin with zero-knowledge server design without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use PrivateBin to manage your utility workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
